parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: scoreMaximum
parameters.description: The maximum score for the line item. Scores created for the Line Item may exceed this value.

parameters.name: label
parameters.description:
The label for the Line Item. If no resourceLinkId is specified this value will also be used
as the name of the placeholder assignment.

parameters.name: resourceId
parameters.description:
A Tool Provider specified id for the Line Item. Multiple line items may
share the same resourceId within a given context.

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description:
A value used to qualify a line Item beyond its ids. Line Items may be queried
by this value in the List endpoint. Multiple line items can share the same tag
within a given context.

parameters.name: resourceLinkId
parameters.description:
The resource link id the Line Item should be attached to. This value should
match the LTI id of the Canvas assignment associated with the tool.

parameters.name: https://canvas.instructure.com/lti/submission_type
parameters.description:
(EXTENSION) - Optional block to set Assignment Submission Type when creating a new assignment is created.
type - 'none' or 'external_tool'::
external_tool_url - Submission URL only used when type: 'external_tool'::

parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: If specified only Line Items with this tag will be included.

parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: If specified only Line Items with this resource_id will be included.

parameters.name: resource_link_id
parameters.description: If specified only Line Items attached to the specified resource_link_id will be included.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: May be used to limit the number of Line Items returned in a page

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID

id.description: The fully qualified URL for showing, updating, and deleting the Line Item

scoreMaximum.description: The maximum score of the Line Item

label.description: The label of the Line Item.

tag.description: Tag used to qualify a line Item beyond its ids

resourceId.description: A Tool Provider specified id for the Line Item. Multiple line items can share the same resourceId within a given context

resourceLinkId.description: The resource link id the Line Item is attached to

https://canvas.instructure.com/lti/submi.description: The extension that defines the submission_type of the line_item. Only returns if set through the line_item create endpoint.
